function.name: addEntry
function.function-prolog: This function adds an entry to the Directory Server from an ldif file

function-arg-def.name: dsInstanceHost
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Directory server hostname or IP address

function-arg-def.name: entryToBeAdded
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Entry to be added to Directory Server in ldif format

function-arg-def.name: extraParams
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Optional extra parameters for specific test cases

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0 Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

sequence.script: mylocation=location
sequence.call: { 'command' : STAFCmd, 'arguments' : STAFCmdParams, 'location' : mylocation, 'name' : 'Add Entry From LDIF', 'expectedRC' : expectedRC }

function.name: ldapModifyWithScript
function.function-prolog: This function performs an ldapmodify using the script

function-arg-def.name: dsAssertionFilter
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the LDAP assertion control with the provided filter

function-arg-def.name: dsContinueOnError
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Continue processing even if there are errors

function-arg-def.name: dsFilename
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Specifies the LDIF file containing the changes to apply

function-arg-def.name: dsEncoding
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the specified character set for command-line input

function-arg-def.name: dsControl
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use a request control with the provided information

function-arg-def.name: dsDryRun
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Show what would be done but do not perform any operation

function-arg-def.name: dsUseStartTLS
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use StartTLS to secure communication with the server

function-arg-def.name: dsUseSASLExternal
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the SASL EXTERNAL authentication mechanism

function-arg-def.name: dsUseSSL
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use SSL for secure communication with the server

function-arg-def.name: dsCertNickname
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Nickname of certificate for SSL client authentication

function-arg-def.name: dsProxyAs
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the proxied authorization control with the given authorization ID

function-arg-def.name: dsPreReadAttributes
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the LDAP ReadEntry pre-read control

function-arg-def.name: dsPostReadAttributes
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the LDAP ReadEntry post-read control

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0 Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

sequence.call: { 'name' : 'LDAP Modify Script', 'command' : STAFCmd, 'arguments' : STAFCmdParams, 'location' : location, 'expectedRC': expectedRC }

function.name: modifyEntry
function.function-prolog: This function modifies an entry in the Directory Server

function-arg-def.name: dsInstanceHost
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Directory server hostname or IP address

function-arg-def.name: entryToBeModified
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Entry to be modified in the Directory Server in ldif format

function-arg-def.name: extraParams
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Optional extra parameters for specific test cases

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0 Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

sequence.script: mylocation=location

STAFCmdParamsList=[] STAFCmdParams=''
if dsPath: dsBinPath='%s/%s' % (dsPath,fileFolder) STAFCmd='%s/ldapmodify%s' % (dsBinPath,fileExt)
sequence.call: { 'location' : location, 'command' : STAFCmd, 'arguments' : STAFCmdParams, 'name' : 'Modify Entry from ldif file', 'expectedRC': expectedRC }

function.name: ldapSearchWithScript
function.function-prolog: This function performs an ldapsearch using the script

function-arg-def.name: dsTypesOnly
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Specifies to only include attribute type names

function-arg-def.name: dsAssertionFilter
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the LDAP assertion control with the provided filter

function-arg-def.name: dsContinueOnError
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Continue processing even if there are errors

function-arg-def.name: dsCountEntries
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Count the number of entries returned by the server

function-arg-def.name: dsFilename
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: File containing a list of search filter strings

function-arg-def.name: dsEncoding
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the specified character set for command-line input

function-arg-def.name: dsControl
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use a request control with the provided information

function-arg-def.name: dsTimeLimit
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Maximum length of time in seconds to allow for the search

function-arg-def.name: dsMatchedValuesFilter
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the LDAP matched values control with the provided filter

function-arg-def.name: dsDryRun
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Show what would be done but do not perform any operation

function-arg-def.name: dsUseStartTLS
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use StartTLS to secure communication with the server

function-arg-def.name: dsUseSASLExternal
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the SASL EXTERNAL authentication mechanism

function-arg-def.name: dsUseSSL
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use SSL for secure communication with the server

function-arg-def.name: dsCertNickname
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Nickname of certificate for SSL client authentication

function-arg-def.name: dsProxyAs
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the proxied authorization control with the given authorization ID

function-arg-def.name: dsUsePasswordPolicyControl
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the password policy request control

function-arg-def.name: dsSimplePageSize
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the simple paged results control with the given page size

function-arg-def.name: dsSortOrder
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Sort the results using the provided sort order

function-arg-def.name: dsVirtualListView
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the virtual list view control to retrieve the specified results page

function-arg-def.name: dsGetEffectiveRightsAuthzid
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use geteffectiverights control with the provided authzid

function-arg-def.name: dsGetEffectiveRightsAttribute
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Specifies geteffectiverights control specific attribute list

function-arg-def.name: dsSizeLimit
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Maximum number of entries to return from the search

function-arg-def.name: dsScope
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: The scope of the search operation

function-arg-def.name: dsBaseDN
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: The baseDN for the search operation

function-arg-def.name: extraParams
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Optional extra parameters for specific test cases

function-arg-def.name: dsFilter
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: The filter for the search operation

function-arg-def.name: outputFile
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Output file containing the search result in ldif format

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0 Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

function-arg-def.name: logStderr
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: If true, stderr for the command is redirect to stdout.

function-arg-property.name: type
function-arg-property.function-arg-property-description: This argument can only have boolean values

sequence.call: { 'name' : 'LDAP Search Script', 'command' : STAFCmd, 'arguments' : STAFCmdParams, 'location' : location, 'outputFile': '%s/%s' % (outputPath, outputFile) , 'expectedRC': expectedRC , 'logStderr' : logStderr }

sequence.script: mylocation=location

if dsPath: dsBinPath='%s/%s' % (dsPath,fileFolder) STAFCmd='%s/ldapsearch%s' % (dsBinPath,fileExt)

function.name: SearchObjectNoPwd
function.function-prolog: This function searches the Directory Server with optional arguments possible

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0 Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

sequence.call: { 'name' : 'Search Base Object No Password', 'command' : '%s/ldapsearch%s' % (dsBinPath,fileExt), 'arguments' : '-h %s -p %s -D "%s" %s -b "%s" "%s"' % (dsInstanceHost,dsInstancePort,dsInstanceDn,extraParams,dsBaseDN,dsFilter), 'location' : location, 'expectedRC': expectedRC }

function.name: _ldapCommonArgs
function.function-prolog: This function resolves common ldap arguments

function.name: ldapPasswordModifyWithScript
function.function-prolog: This function performs an ldappasswordmodify using the script

function-arg-def.name: dsUseStartTLS
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use StartTLS to secure communication with the server

function-arg-def.name: dsUseSSL
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use SSL for secure communication with the server

function-arg-def.name: dsAuthzID
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Specifies the authorization ID for the user entry whose password should be changed

function-arg-def.name: dsProvideDNForAuthzID
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Indicates that the bind DN should be used as the authorization ID for the password modify operation

function-arg-def.name: dsCurrentPassword
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Specifies the current password for the target user

function-arg-def.name: dsCurrentPasswordFile
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Specifies the path to a file containing the current password for the target user

function-arg-def.name: dsNewPassword
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Specifies the new password for the target user

function-arg-def.name: dsNewPasswordFile
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Specifies the path to a file containing the new password for the target user

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0 Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

sequence.call: { 'name' : 'LDAP Password Modify Script', 'command' : STAFCmd, 'arguments' : STAFCmdParams, 'location' : location, 'expectedRC': expectedRC }

function.name: modifyAnAttribute
function.function-prolog: This function modifies an entry in the Directory Server

function-arg-def.name: dsInstanceHost
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Directory server hostname or IP address

function-arg-def.name: listAttributes
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: List of attributes name and value to modify. The format is name:value

function-arg-def.name: changetype
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Type of modification, can be delete, add, replace

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0 Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

sequence.script:
mylocation=location
STAFCmdParamsList=[] STAFCmdParams='' STAFCmd=''
if newAttributeValue: newAttributeValue=newAttributeValue.replace('"','QUOT')
sequence.call: { 'name' : 'Modify An Attribute value', 'command' : '%s/bin/java' % JAVA_HOME, 'arguments' : '%s %s' % (STAFCmd,STAFCmdParams), 'location' : location, 'envCmd' : ['CLASSPATH=%s/../%s/ldap' % (dsPath,remote.reljavadir)], 'path' : '%s/../%s/ldap' % (dsPath,remote.reljavadir), 'expectedRC': expectedRC }

function.name: loadOfModifies
function.function-prolog: This function creates a load of modifies against Directory. It is only for entries with uid=user.xxx.

function-arg-def.name: dsInstanceHost
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Directory server hostname or IP address

function-arg-def.name: partialDNToModify
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: partial DN to modify, all but the uid=user.xxxx

function-arg-def.name: listAttributes
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: List of attributes name and value to modify. The format is name:value

function-arg-def.name: changetype
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Type of modification, can be delete, add, replace

function-arg-def.name: clientID
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: ID for the client doing the modify

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0 Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

sequence.script: import random curr_rdn_num=random.randint(0,99) curr_dn="uid=user.%s,%s" % (curr_rdn_num, partialDNToModify)
sequence.call: { 'dsInstanceHost' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_HOST , 'dsInstancePort' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_PORT , 'dsInstanceDn' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_DN , 'dsInstancePswd' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_PSWD , 'dsPath' : dsPath , 'DNToModify' : curr_dn , 'attributeName' : 'description' , 'newAttributeValue' : 'New description for %s' % curr_dn , 'changetype' : 'replace' , 'suppressTestStatus' : '1' }

function.name: addAnEntry
function.function-prolog: This function modifies an entry in the Directory Server

function-arg-def.name: dsInstanceHost
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Directory server hostname or IP address

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0 Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

sequence.script:
mylocation=location
# build the command STAFCmdParamsList=[] STAFCmdParams='' STAFCmd=''
if DNToAdd: STAFCmdParamsList.append('-d "%s"' % DNToAdd) STAFCmdParams=' '.join(STAFCmdParamsList) STAFCmd='addAnEntry'

function-arg-def.name: dsInstanceHost
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Directory server hostname or IP address

function-arg-def.name: deleteOldRDN
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: 1 : delete old rdn, 0 do not delete old rdn, default value is 1

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0 Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

sequence.script: mylocation=location #Build the Command STAFCmdParamsList=[] STAFCmdParams='' STAFCmd=''
